revised_title: Awards and Achievements in Science: Anniversary Address by Sir Cyril Hinshelwood
tldr: In this Anniversary Address, Sir Cyril Hinshelwood highlights the achievements and contributions of several scientists, including Sir Macfarlane Burnet, Professor R. E. Peierls, Professor P. B. Medawar, and Dr. A. B. Pippard. Burnet's work focuses on viruses and immunity, Peierls's on solid-state theory and nuclear physics, Medawar's on tissue grafting and aging, and Pippard's on low-temperature physics and superconductivity. The address also mentions recent scientific discoveries, such as the transmission of photographs from the Moon by the Russian Lunik spacecraft.
